```{r}
library(dplyr)
MData<- read.csv("measurements.csv")
head(MData)
```
```{r}
MData<- MData %>%
  mutate(Sp= sub("^([A-Za-z])[a-z]+", "\\1.", species))

head(MData)

```
#3. Reorder columns
```{r}
MData<- MData %>%
  select(Sp, everything(), -species)
head(MData)
```
#4.
```{r}

write.csv(MData, "MeasShort.csv", row.names = FALSE)

system("git add Regex.Rmd Regex.html MeasShort.csv")
system("git commit -m 'Added Regex assignment and shortened dataset'")
system("git push")

```
